== Main inclusion report for language-selector ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/l/language-selector, available on all arches (python).

2. ''Rationale:'' Will be part of the desktop seed and the default way to install a new language/switch the current language

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* Writen in Python
* Uses python-apt, needs gksudo to be executed

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: adds itself to the system menu (System/Administration)
* Bugs: only one whishlist bug in ubuntu bugzilla

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `python` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian policy met (two minor lintian warning that will be fixed with the next upload).

=== Reviewers ===

MartinPitt: trivially approved, its our own creation
